lead_paragraph: Carolina has tobacco and NASCAR while Denver has legalized marijuana and the Rocky Mountains but come Sunday only one will also be called home of the Super Bowl 50 champions.

headline.print_headline: Mile High City Takes on Tobacco Road for Super Bowl 50
headline.main: Mile High City Takes on Tobacco Road for Super Bowl 50

snippet: Carolina has tobacco and NASCAR while Denver has legalized marijuana and the Rocky Mountains but come Sunday only one will also be called home of the Super Bowl 50 champions....
